title: Countries with the lowest fertility rate globally 2050 to 2055
yAxis: Average number of children per woman
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Average number of children per woman for 25 number of Countrys.
Country Brunei Darussalam has the highest Average number of children per woman and Singapore has the lowest Average number of children per woman.
The highest Country Brunei Darussalam has 0.21 more Average number of children per woman than the lowest Country Singapore.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Average number of children per woman in the y axis.
Country Brunei Darussalam has the highest Average number of children per woman and Singapore has the lowest Average number of children per woman.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Average number of children per woman for 25 number of Countrys.
Country Brunei Darussalam has the highest Average number of children per woman and Singapore has the lowest Average number of children per woman.
The highest Country Brunei Darussalam has 0.21 more Average number of children per woman than the lowest Country Singapore.
max_summary: This bar chart has 25 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Average number of children per woman in each Country on the y axis.
Country Brunei Darussalam has the highest Average number of children per woman and Singapore has the lowest Average number of children per woman.
Country Canada has the second highest value for Average number of children per woman.
The minimum Country Singapore has got 1.15 times less Average number of children per woman than the maximum Country Brunei Darussalam.
Average number of children per woman at Country Brunei Darussalam is 1.59 , second place is Canada at 1.59, and thirdly is Canada at 1.59.
Similar Average number of children per woman is found in Country Brunei Darussalam, Portugal, Spain, and Canada.
The average Average number of children per woman in all 25 Countrys is 1.53.
